data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Kermanshah.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kermanshah, Iran

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Kermanshah that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Kermanshah, Iran to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Kermanshah.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Kermanshah, Iran to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: There are 1,952,400 people living in the state of Kermanshah. Only about 10,171 might be believers.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kermanshah, Iran has a population of 1,952,400.

We estimate Kermanshah has 10,171 people who might know Jesus, 26,365 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,915,864 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 191 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,915,864 lost people in  Kermanshah, Iran have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.
